description: Issue submitted using proper template (has resource-submission label). Script outputs 'close' but workflow job never runs due to label condition.
title: [Resource]: awesome-resource

### Description

This is an awesome resource and I think it would be great to include. It has full testing and I recommend it. Terminal session manager for running multiple coding sessions in parallel.

### Validate Claims

Install via the readme instructions, then open the application and observe the features in action.

### Recommendation Checklist
